snippet.title: Lost Away - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Lost Away is a first-person survival action game set on a fictional planet outside our solar system. Its protagonist is a man who came to a mysterious planet after the crash of a spaceship he was a passenger. Discover why you ended up here and survive using natural resources and crafted items.

Add Lost Away to your Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1752560/Lost_Away
